entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:28 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 11:45 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: SSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
